name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

name: Hydrocarbons and Functional Groups
description: Study of hydrocarbons and introduction to functional group chemistry.

lessons.name: Functional Groups Overview
lessons.description: An introduction to key organic functional groups.

name: Stereochemistry and Isomerism
description: Exploration of molecular geometry and optical activity.

lessons.name: Isomerism
lessons.description: Different types of isomers in organic chemistry.

name: Reaction Mechanisms
description: Detailed study of substitution, addition, and elimination reactions.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Study of metal complexes, bonding, and structure.

lessons.name: Ligands and Coordination Numbers
lessons.description: Fundamentals of ligand bonding and coordination.

name: Transition Metal Chemistry
description: Exploring the chemistry and applications of transition metals.

name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
description: Understanding the role of metal ions in biological systems.

name: Thermodynamics in Chemistry
description: Study of energy, heat, and work in chemical systems.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Analysis of reaction rates and mechanisms.

name: Quantum Chemistry and Spectroscopy
description: Fundamentals of quantum mechanics and spectroscopy applications.

name: Elvish Languages: Quenya and Sindarin
description: Phonology, grammar, and writing systems of Elvish tongues.

lessons.name: Quenya Basics
lessons.description: An introduction to Quenya vocabulary and syntax.

lessons.name: Sindarin Structure
lessons.description: Exploring the linguistic structure of Sindarin.

name: Dwarvish and the Black Speech
description: Study of Khuzdul and the Black Speech of Mordor.

name: Scripts of Middle-earth
description: Exploring Tengwar, Cirth, and other writing systems.

name: The Council of Elrond
description: Study of diplomacy and leadership in Middle-earth.

name: The War of the Ring
description: Analyzing major conflicts and their political implications.

name: Alliances and Treaties
description: Inter-species cooperation and the making of peace in Middle-earth.
